 2018-01932018-03-06,  ,  ESDC,  , 
ActApprentice Loans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Apprentice Loans Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the APPRENTICE LOANS REGULATIONS in order to align with recent legislative changes to the definition of “qualifying student” in the Canada Student Financial Assistance Act that are set to come into force on August 1, 2018.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0032 Publication Date: 2018-03-21
AttachmentsAttachment
